thread.title: SOCi Announced as Finalist for SDX 2015 Brand Diego's B2B a
thread.title_full: SOCi Announced as Finalist for SDX 2015 Brand Diego's B2B a

author: SOCi, Inc.
title: SOCi Announced as Finalist for SDX 2015 Brand Diego's B2B a
text:
SAN DIEGO , Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --  SOCi, Inc. , the next generation social media content discovery and marketing company, has been named a finalist in two categories for SDX's 2015 Brand Diego Awards. SOCi was named a finalist as Emerging Brand of the Year, as well as B2B Brand of the Year. SOCi co-founder and CMO, Tony Rindsberg has also been selected as a finalist for Brand Professional of the Year. Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151016/277788LOGO    
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151016/277789 
"The SDX Brand Diego Awards honor San Diego companies and individuals who have made a notable or lasting impact in advertising, marketing, or communications to help build strong brands. Let's face it, as consumers we rely on strong brands and the values those brands project. It gives us confidence in choosing products and services," said Doug Hecht , 2015/16 SDX president.
"Being a finalist in two categories of the Brand Diego Awards is incredibly exciting for us," said SOCi CEO and founder, Afif Khoury . "Last year we took home Innovator of the Year, this year we're looking forward to leaving with some hardware again," joked Khoury. "But either way, we're absolutely honored to be recognized by SDX and the San Diego community." 
The SDX Brand Diego Awards Celebration is Wednesday, October 21 at Tom Ham's Lighthouse. The party starts with a short reception at 5:30pm and the Awards ceremony will start promptly at 6pm . After the 2015 SDX Brand Diego Awards are announced, the celebration begins with cocktails and hors d'oeuvres overlooking the beautiful San Diego skyline! Reservations available at https://bit.ly/BDA2015 . 
For a complete list of finalists and categories, please see the SDX 2015 Brand Diego Awards Press Release. 
For more information about SOCi, please visit https://www.meetsoci.com .
ABOUT SOCi 
SOCi is the leading enterprise solution for social content discovery and social media marketing. The next generation social media SaaS platform utilizes a proprietary scoring algorithm to discover, evaluate and rank social content, enabling social media managers to curate and distribute engaging social content proven to resonate with a target audience. SOCi is used by enterprises, digital agencies, and major media companies to deliver social media services to SMBs efficiently and effectively at scale.
About SDX 
Founded in 1911, SDX (formerly the San Diego Ad Club) is San Diego's oldest continuously operating business association. SDX brings together creative thinkers, business planners, marketing aficionados, communications technology innovators and more in order to build a community of professionals focused on what's next in the industry. SDX is creative, rooted in brand building, committed to public service and grounded in building valuable professional and personal relationships.
